pariyeti：[pari-i] 繞著（到處來回地）走，繞圈子．ger．paricca； pp．pareta．
pariyeti：[pari-i] 歩き回る，回る．ger．paricca； pp．pareta．
Pariyeti，[pari+i] to go about，to go round，encircle，encompass； ger．paricca （q．v．）．The pp．is represented by pareta，see also pareti which seems to stand for pariyeti．（Page 434）

pariyeti：ပရိယေတိ （ပရိ√ဣ）
လှည့်လည်၏။ ပတ်၍ သွား၏။
